result.execSummary:
The defendant Matthew David Gilbertson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Matthew David Gilbertson is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Matthew David Gilbertson was found guilty of Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Use of a Dangerous Weapon, Penalties for Misdemeanors-Class "B"], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Green County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes:
7 days credit in the event probation is revoked.
Concurrent with: any other sentence

miscConds.notes: Defendant to pay DNA surcharge, supervision fees through probation as determined by agent. Defendant has previously paid crime victim witness surcharge and court costs during course of deferred conviction agreement.
Defendant to undergo treatment and counseling agent deems appropriate and complete any recommendations.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

supervisions.notes:
May be served under the Huber Law as long as the defendant reports and remains alcohol and controlled substance free. Huber for purposes of treatment as well as employment.
10/18/19  ORDER to amend JOC as follows - Defendant shall be permitted to consume suboxone, also known as buprenorphine and naloxone, provided that he has a valid prescription, during his sentence at the Green County Jail.
All prior assessments on this case converted to civil judgment by order of the court.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea
